content: a n ode to the sea the salt chuck socks are simple yet salt chuck spruced up basic cuff down socks with a twist k knit p purl k1tbl knit one through the back loop socks p1tbl purl one through the back loop k2tog knit two together ssk slip slip knit mc main color cc contrast color bor beginning of round yarn two skeins of fingering weight sock yarn one full pm skein and one mini would do i used seven sisters arts place marker meridian gague 32 sts x 44 row in 4 of stockinette needles 2 5mm us1 5 9 circular & one long circular for toe decreases sizes 1 7 / 2 8 / 3 9 / 4 10 written by sarah banks @stockinette_sarah salt chuck socks cuff turn the heel as follows in your main color using long tail cast on 56/60/64/68 stitches row 1 | knit across stitches to twin stitch knit into twin stitch place bor marker and join in the round create a triplet from the next twin stitch using the same method knit 15 rounds of twisted rib *k1tbl p1tbl* repeat as you did to make your twins place the triplet back on the left needle turn your work leg row 2 | purl across stitches to twin stitch purl into the twin row 1 | knit all stitches stitch create a triplet from the next twin stitch place triplet row 2 - 5 | *k3 p1* repeat ~do not cut mc yarn~ back on the left needle turn your work row 6 | with cc knit all stitches row 3 | purl across stitches and knit into first triplet you get to ~ catch your mc strand on row 8 ~ create a triplet out of the next twin place it on the left needle row 7 - 10 | *k3 p1* repeat ~do not cut cc yarn~ turn your work repeat row 6-10 with mc row 4 | purl across stitches and purl into the first triplet you repeat row 6-10 with cc ~cut cc yarn~ get to create a triplet out of the next twin place it on the left repeat *k3 p1* stitch pattern for a total of 50 row needle turn your work repeat row 1 and 2 until you have made the last purl row heel triplet place triplet on the right needle turn your work knit across and into the last triplet on your knit row ~cut your cc work shadow wrap heel as follows yarn~ row 1 | with mc knit across half of the stitches on your needle slip marker pick up mc yarn and continue in *k3p1* pattern 28/30/32/34 pm ~cut mc yarn~ until bor with cc knit across the second half of the stitches on your needle to one stitch before bor with your right needle pick up the stitch below the last stitch foot and place it on the left needle and knit that stitch to create a second stitch
